verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> to my <S%H4405>speech.<s%> Let this be your <S%H8575>consolation.<s%>
<S%H5375>Allow<s%> <S%H1696>me,<s%> and I also will speak; <S%H310>After<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken,<s%> mock <S%H3932>on.<s%>
As for <S%H7879>me,<s%> is my complaint to <S%H120>man?<s%> Why <S%H7307>shouldn't<s%> I be <S%H7114>impatient?<s%>
<S%H6437>Look<s%> at <S%H8074>me,<s%> and be astonished. <S%H7760>Lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on your <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
When I <S%H2142>remember,<s%> I am <S%H926>troubled.<s%> <S%H6427>Horror<s%> takes hold <S%H270>of<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
"Why do the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> become <S%H6275>old,<s%> <S%H1396>yes,<s%> and grow mighty in <S%H2428>power?<s%>
Their <S%H2233>child<s%> is <S%H3559>established<s%> with them in their <S%H6440>sight,<s%> their <S%H6631>offspring<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>
Their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H7965>safe<s%> from <S%H6343>fear,<s%> neither is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of God upon <S%H433>them.<s%>
Their <S%H7794>bulls<s%> <S%H5674>breed<s%> without <S%H1602>fail.<s%> Their <S%H6510>cows<s%> <S%H6403>calve,<s%> and <S%H7921>don't<s%> miscarry.
They send <S%H7971>forth<s%> their little <S%H5759>ones<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock.<s%> Their <S%H3206>children<s%> <S%H7540>dance.<s%>
They <S%H5375>sing<s%> to the <S%H8596>tambourine<s%> and <S%H3658>harp,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H5748>pipe.<s%>
They <S%H3615>spend<s%> their <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H2896>prosperity.<s%> In an <S%H7281>instant<s%> they go <S%H2865>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
They <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H5493><s%> 'Depart from <S%H2654>us,<s%> for we don't want to <S%H1847>know<s%> about your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
What is the <S%H7706>Almighty,<s%> that we should <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3276>him?<s%> What profit should we <S%H6293>have,<s%> if we pray to him?'
<S%H2898>Behold,<s%> their prosperity is not in their <S%H3027>hand.<s%> The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is far from <S%H7368>me.<s%>

"How often is it that the <S%H5216>lamp<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is put <S%H1846>out,<s%> that their <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> on <S%H2505>them,<s%> that God distributes <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> in his <S%H639>anger?<s%>
How often is it that they are as <S%H8401>stubble<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> as <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that the <S%H5492>storm<s%> carries <S%H1589>away?<s%>
You <S%H433>say,<s%> 'God lays <S%H6845>up<s%> his <S%H205>iniquity<s%> for his <S%H1121>children.<s%>' Let him <S%H7999>recompense<s%> it to <S%H3045>himself,<s%> that he may know it.
Let his own <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H3589>destruction.<s%> Let him <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H2534>wrath<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
For what does he <S%H2656>care<s%> for his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4557>him,<s%> when the number of his <S%H2320>months<s%> is cut <S%H2686>off?<s%>
"Shall any <S%H3925>teach<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> since he <S%H8199>judges<s%> those who are <S%H7311>high?<s%>
One <S%H4191>dies<s%> in his <S%H8537>full<s%> <S%H6106>strength,<s%> being wholly at <S%H7946>ease<s%> and <S%H7961>quiet.<s%>
His <S%H5845>pails<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2461>milk.<s%> The <S%H4221>marrow<s%> of his <S%H6106>bones<s%> is <S%H8248>moistened.<s%>
Another <S%H4191>dies<s%> in <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and never <S%H398>tastes<s%> of <S%H2896>good.<s%>
They lie <S%H7901>down<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> The <S%H7415>worm<s%> covers <S%H3680>them.<s%>
<S%H3045>"Behold,<s%> I know your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> the <S%H4209>devices<s%> with which you would wrong <S%H2554>me.<s%>
For you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1004><s%> 'Where is the house of the <S%H5081>prince?<s%> Where is the <S%H4908>tent<s%> in which the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H4908>lived?<s%>'
<S%H7592>Haven't<s%> you asked <S%H1870>wayfaring<s%> <S%H5674>men?<s%> <S%H5234>Don't<s%> you know their <S%H226>evidences,<s%>
that the <S%H7451>evil<s%> man is <S%H2820>reserved<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H343>calamity,<s%> That they are led <S%H2986>forth<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath?<s%>
Who shall <S%H5046>declare<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> to his <S%H6440>face?<s%> Who shall <S%H7999>repay<s%> him what he has <S%H6213>done?<s%>
Yet he will be <S%H2986>borne<s%> to the <S%H6913>grave.<s%> Men shall keep <S%H8245>watch<s%> over the <S%H1430>tomb.<s%>

The <S%H7263>clods<s%> of the <S%H5158>valley<s%> shall be <S%H4985>sweet<s%> to <S%H120>him.<s%> All men shall <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4557>him,<s%> as there were innumerable before <S%H6440>him.<s%>
So how can you <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me with <S%H1892>nonsense,<s%> because in your <S%H8666>answers<s%> there <S%H7604>remains<s%> only <S%H4604>falsehood?<s%>"
